__TOC__

This page served to document authoritative points of contact for Ubuntu and Canonical.  Because it was maintained unofficially, it contained outdated and inaccurate information.  In its place, here are links to authoritative sources of similar information:

* Points of contact for Ubuntu development can be found at DeveloperResponsibilities.
* Information about Canonical Ltd, including contact information and technical support, can be found at http://www.canonical.com/
* Launchpad contacts can be found at https://help.launchpad.net/Feedback
* Bazaar information can be found at http://bazaar-vcs.org/
